column5: Finally got around to putting together a video from our trip in June. We hit a few lakes in the Ignace and Silver Dollar area.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vHH31cxjaI Kids are really growing into it.
Great stuff...thanks for the share. Kakabeka falls sure brought back some memories for me.
Great family fun, good to see the way the kids took to it, nice going! Bill

Looks like a great trip, thanks for sharing. There are so many places that are awe inspiring like those falls and being a fisherman so often allow us to see them, another benefit to our passion!Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Great video, thanks for sharing - looks like some awesome memories!
